web/src/components/machines/MachineCard..description: Action buttons (Failover, Testar, CPU Migration, Pause, GPU Migration, Start) now have descriptive aria-labels. The Start button uses a dynamic label with the GPU name for context. Pause button includes warning about interrupted processes.

web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: DropdownMenu component (lines 577-664) is custom implementation lacking ARIA attributes. Used for main options menu and VS Code IDE dropdown. Needs aria-expanded, aria-haspopup, role='menu', role='menuitem', and keyboard navigation.
